name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Hardware Info & Monitor Utility for ChromeOS

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Simple & Powerful Hardware Information Utility for ChromeOS.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
crOS HI&MU allows you to monitor your hardware's current usage statistics & list your hardware's exact information without requiring you to leave your browser.

Source code available on GitHub: https://github.com/gokacinlar/chromeos-hw-resource-app/ 

- Release Notes

v1.0.4:
-New: Extension now supports displaying Network Information

v1.0.3:
- New: Extension now supports displaying GPU Information
- New: Added tabs to switch between hardware monitoring & information for UI clarity.
 
v1.0.2: 
- New: Extension now supports displaying Monitor (Display) Information
- Fix: Various fixes

v.1.0.1: 
-Initial Stable Release
